name: Strategy Prototype
description:
1: Resources you posses, the firs number is what you have on you storage, the second one is what you produce per day

2: List of buildings you can build, when you select one, the cost will appear over the resource it will cost

3: I'm still thinking what to do with this panel, but probably actions to the building currently selected

4: Calendar with the actual day and progress to the next day

Controls:

Left Click: Almost for everything, you select building and build where possible

Right Click: Close Info panel of buildings (Right now only the mine have this)

Central Mouse Click: Drag camera

Mouse wheel: Zoom on map
